Posts.Content: Spread of breast cancer to lugs,chest,heart cavity,ect. like to know someone in posible same situation.
Posts.Title: breast cancer (metastatic stageIV)

Posts.Content: Hello Dr. Leo , I've been diagnosed with stage 4 breast cancer. I'd like to meet someone with a case similar to mine who has beaten the odds. Thank you for your interest.
